attributes.action: Increase the number of free childcare for 3 to 4 years old to 30 hours per week
attributes.background: If the government wants everyone working, then they need to help more! Most of us mothers can not afford to work and pay for childcare as it would cost us to work! By helping families who earn less than 50k per year with the cost of childcare, lots of us would go back to work.
